Title: Bridget Jones's Baby
Writer: Helen Fielding (screenplay), Dan Mazer (screenplay), Emma Thompson (screenplay), Helen Fielding (based on the characters and story created by), Helen Fielding (story by)
Actors: Ren√©e Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Jim Broadbent, Sally Phillips
Plot: Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. In a twist, she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.
Production: Working Title Films, Perfect World Pictures
